original_text:
For thus says the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel:
The daughter of Babylon is like a threshing floor
    at the time when it is trodden;
yet a little while
    and the time of her harvest will come.”
korean_text: 만군의 여호와 이스라엘의 하나님께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 딸 바벨론은 때가 이른 타작 마당과 같은지라 멀지 않아 추수 때가 이르리라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: For thus says the Lord of hosts,
The daughter of Babylon is like a threshing floor
at the time when it is trodden;
and the time of her harvest will come.”
